sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates line array object for service goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • GR Service - References the receipt record.

Outputs :

  • Service Goods Receipt - Objects containing below fields:

    • Package number
    • Internal line number
    • Line Number
    • Hierarchy level of group
    • Outline Level
    • Indicator: Outline line
    • Subpackage number
    • Activity Number
    • Short Description of Service Type
    • Edition of Service Type
    • Standard Service Catalog Item
    • Vendor's Service Number
    • Quantity with Sign
    • Base Unit of Measure
    • ISO code for unit of measurement
    • Overfulfillment Tolerance
    • Unlimited Overfulfillment
    • Price unit
    • Gross price
    • Lower Limit
    • Upper Limit
    • Short Text
    • Distribution indicator for multiple account assignment
    • Personnel Number
    • Wage Type
    • Source package number
    • Entry: Planned package line
    • Entry: Unplanned from contract
    • Entry: Unplanned from contract
    • Entry: Unplanned service from model specifications
    • Entry: Unplanned service from model specifications
    • Service line refers to standard service catalog limits
    • Entry: Unplanned, limit line
    • Target Value
    • Alternatives: Reference to basic item
    • Basic Line
    • Alternative Line
    • Bidder's Line
    • Supplementary Line
    • Line with Open Quantity
    • Informatory Line
    • Blanket Line
    • Contingency Line
    • Tax on Sales/Purchases Code
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Material Group
    • Date
    • Start Time
    • End Time
    • External Personnel Number
    • Formula Number
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • Hierarchically superior line number
    • External Reference Key for Service
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Period of Performance Start Date
    • Period of Performance End Date
    • SRM Reference Key
    • Item Key for eSOA Messages
    • Net value
  • Action Status - Object containing following fields:
    • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

action_id.display_value: Generate Hana Service GR Line Object

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates line array object for service goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • GR Service - References the receipt record.

Outputs :

  • Service Goods Receipt - Objects containing below fields:

    • Package number
    • Internal line number
    • Line Number
    • Hierarchy level of group
    • Outline Level
    • Indicator: Outline line
    • Subpackage number
    • Activity Number
    • Short Description of Service Type
    • Edition of Service Type
    • Standard Service Catalog Item
    • Vendor's Service Number
    • Quantity with Sign
    • Base Unit of Measure
    • ISO code for unit of measurement
    • Overfulfillment Tolerance
    • Unlimited Overfulfillment
    • Price unit
    • Gross price
    • Lower Limit
    • Upper Limit
    • Short Text
    • Distribution indicator for multiple account assignment
    • Personnel Number
    • Wage Type
    • Source package number
    • Entry: Planned package line
    • Entry: Unplanned from contract
    • Entry: Unplanned from contract
    • Entry: Unplanned service from model specifications
    • Entry: Unplanned service from model specifications
    • Service line refers to standard service catalog limits
    • Entry: Unplanned, limit line
    • Target Value
    • Alternatives: Reference to basic item
    • Basic Line
    • Alternative Line
    • Bidder's Line
    • Supplementary Line
    • Line with Open Quantity
    • Informatory Line
    • Blanket Line
    • Contingency Line
    • Tax on Sales/Purchases Code
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Price Change in Entry Sheet
    • Material Group
    • Date
    • Start Time
    • End Time
    • External Personnel Number
    • Formula Number
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • Formula Value
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • User-Defined Field
    • Hierarchically superior line number
    • External Reference Key for Service
    • Deletion Indicator
    • Period of Performance Start Date
    • Period of Performance End Date
    • SRM Reference Key
    • Item Key for eSOA Messages
    • Net value
  • Action Status - Object containing following fields:
    • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
